definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: In this dissertation, a new computation method of fractal dimension has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的計算分形維數的方法。

sentences.english: The short scaling time series have multifractal properties.
sentences.chinese: 小標度時間序列存在多重分形特徵。

sentences.english: In this paper, a fast algorithm for the fractal signal wavelet decomposition and reconstruction is put foreward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了分形信號的小波分解與重構的一種快速算法。

sentences.english: Based on the fractal theory, the fractal dimension of Chinese coastline and its character are stu-died.
sentences.chinese: 根據分形理論，系統研究了中國海岸線分維及其性質。

sentences.english: Look outside your window - you may see a fractal cloud at any moment.
sentences.chinese: 任何適合你朝窗外望去，都可以看見分形裝的雲。

sentences.english: Application of Fractal Geometry in Pedology and its Prosptects.
sentences.chinese: 分形幾何在土壤學中的應用及其展望。

sentences.english: Finally, it discusses the multiscale fractal feature of quasicrystal conjugate structure.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了準晶共軛結構的多標度分形特徵。

sentences.english: Using the method of fractal geometry to describe the profile of grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 並用分形幾何的方法描述砂輪表面輪廓形貌。

sentences.english: He modeled a tree as cantilevered beams assembled to form a fractal network.
sentences.chinese: 他將樹木當作懸臂結構來建模，並形成一個分形網絡。

sentences.english: Section 1 studies the monofractal of securities market.
sentences.chinese: 證券市場的單分形特徵研究。

sentences.english: Most natural trees grow in a fairly fractal fashion.
sentences.chinese: 大多數自然生長的樹木都是以近乎分形的模式生長的。

sentences.english: The application of fractal geometry to characterize the distribution of soil macropores is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了分形幾何在確定土壤大孔隙分佈中的應用。

sentences.english: Quantized affine transformation T constitutes the fractal block coding of the image block.
sentences.chinese: 量化後的仿射變換T構成了圖像塊的分形塊編碼。

sentences.english: Charpter2: Effect of filters on singular value of the time series.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，濾波對分形時間序列奇異值分解的影響。

sentences.english: Similarity was statistically and the results of measurement agreed with the unite principle of fractal theory.
sentences.chinese: 各局部分維測量結果支持分形理論中的和並原理。

sentences.english: Fractal dimensions of grains in the standard photographs are measured.
sentences.chinese: 測量了標準圖譜中鐵素體晶粒度圖形的分形維數。
